title: Jadon Sancho
summary: Jadon Malik Sancho (born 25 March 2000) is an English professional footballer who plays as a winger for Premier League club Manchester United and the England national team. He is known for his trickery, pace and use of feints in one-on-one situations.[5] He came runner-up for the 2019 Kopa Trophy and was nominated to the 40-man shortlist for the 2020 Golden Boy.[6]
